I'm a **Life Long Learner** and like to learn something new everyday. I'm currently working as a **Full Stack Developer**.

- üå± On the way of learning *Advanced Machine Learning* & *Data Science* (also enjoying _Web Dev_).
- üî• Most proud of -- [Self Driving Car Project](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Tm97CV2Cxw), an obstacle detection self driving car.
- üìö My notes of learning at [alihamidali.github.io](https://alihamidali.github.io).
- üòç My hobbies are [drawing](https://photos.app.goo.gl/9OVEkdTjmtRPg7vC3), [reading](https://www.goodreads.com/user/show/19630622-thi-dinh) and [cooking](https://goo.gl/photos/yQXdQws1LLS16x5v5).
- üíå Contact me at [alihamidali2@gmail.com](mailto:alihamidali2@gmail.com).
